unfriend(String) - Method in class is201.g5t08.farmcity.boundary.FriendsMenu
This method display the message from the unfriend method from FriendsController.
unfriend(User, String) - Method in class is201.g5t08.farmcity.control.FriendsController
This method checks for valid user input by checking the number of friends the user have It returns error messages if user enters invalid input.

This method loop through the list of friends and remove friend to be unfriended After removing from the list of friends, save it to the CSV.
update(User, List<Plot>) - Method in class is201.g5t08.farmcity.dao.PlotDataManager
Updates a user's list of plots, and saves it to the csv file.
update(User) - Method in class is201.g5t08.farmcity.dao.UserDataManager
Updates a user's data, then writes it to the csv data file.
updateGiftRecord(Gift) - Method in class is201.g5t08.farmcity.dao.GiftDataManager
This method returns an updated giftMap by adding new gift record to the map
updateInventory(User, String, int) - Method in class is201.g5t08.farmcity.dao.InventoryDataManager
This method returns an updated inventoryMap It loops through the inventoryList of Inventory to check if there is exiting user and crop If yes, update the quantity of existing records in inventoryMap If no, add the new Inventory to inventoryList, and then add to inventoryMap
User - Class in is201.g5t08.farmcity.entity
The User class presents a player in the game.
User(String, String, String) - Constructor for class is201.g5t08.farmcity.entity.User
Instantiates a new user with the specified username, full name and password.
User(String, String, String, int, int) - Constructor for class is201.g5t08.farmcity.entity.User
Instantiates a new user with the specified username, full name, password, xp and gold.
UserDataManager - Class in is201.g5t08.farmcity.dao
The Class UserDataManager stores data about all the users in a key-value store, with the user's username as the key and the User as the value..
UserDataManager() - Constructor for class is201.g5t08.farmcity.dao.UserDataManager
Instantiates a new user data manager, loading the user data from the csv into the users hashmap.
UserValidator - Class in is201.g5t08.farmcity.control
The Class UserValidator is a utility class that validates the user object for registration and login purposes.
